name: ZenThermostat–WiFiEdition
0:
”Alexa, set the thermostat temperature to 74 degrees”
”Alexa, increase the thermostat temperature by 2 degrees”
”Alexa, what is the temperature inside?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Manage your home comfort by voice with Zen Thermostat WiFi Edition and Amazon Alexa. Change setpoint, change modes from heating to cooling, and check ambient temperature -- all by voice command.

Sample Commands include:

• To adjust the temperature say: “decrease the thermostat temperature”, “increase the thermostat temperature”, “increase the thermostat temperature by 2 degrees”
• To switch heating or cooling modes say: “set thermostat to cool”, “set bedroom to heat”
• To hear the current indoor temperature say: “what is the temperature inside?”

NOTE: This Alexa skill only works with the WiFi Edition of Zen Thermostat. If you are using the ZigBee version of the Zen Thermostat with a home automation system, please refer to the Alexa apps of your home automation hub provider for control of home heating/cooling, if available.
